Package it.polimi.se2018.networking.client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientNetInterface
    The interface for all clients or virtual-clients of the package 'networking', independently from the kind of implementation.
    RmiClientInterface
    Interface for an Rmi client.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    Represents the client.
    ClientImplementation
    This class defines what the client does when it receives a message from the network.
    ClientTest
    Unit tests for Client.
    DummyClient
    Dummy ClientNetInterface only used in tests to isolate the behaviour under test.
    NetworkHandlerFactory
    Static class to decouple network handler instantiation from its usage.
    RmiClientImplementation
    The implementation of the remote interface RmiClientInterface.
    RmiClientImplementationTest  
    RmiNetworkHandler
    The network handler: it simulates the sever on the client.
    TcpNetworkHandler
    This class represents the server on client side.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Client.ConnectionRefusedException
    Exception to indicate the connection was refused.
